meanings.definition: A boat designed for use on canals.
meanings.sent1: The canalboat slowly glided through the calm waters of the canal.
meanings.sent2: We rented a canalboat for a relaxing day trip along the canal.
meanings.sent3: The canalboat decided to take a detour through a narrow stream for an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as steady as a canalboat navigating through the twists and turns of life.
meanings.sent5: The colorful canalboat painted a vibrant picture against the green backdrop of the canal.

meanings.definition: A type of vessel used for transporting goods or passengers on a canal.
meanings.sent1: The canalboat was loaded with crates of fresh produce for delivery to the market.
meanings.sent2: Passengers waved from the canalboat as it passed under the old stone bridge.
meanings.sent3: The canalboat captain joked that the cargo of rubber ducks was for a secret mission.
meanings.sent4: The canalboat carried dreams and hopes along the waterway to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed from the canalboat as it made its way through the peaceful canal.
